messageBody:
Steve,

I use "the standard reflective stuff", to have the TestCase call my
"testxxxxx" methods.
What I'm looking for is to obtain the name of the current "testxxxxx"
method.

I would also like to obtain the status (did it failed?) of this "testxxxxx"
method.

Alain
